lead_paragraph: Australian Amy Perrett is set to become the first woman assistant referee in Super Rugby history when she officiates in the game between Melbourne Rebels and South Africa's Stormers on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Australian Perrett to Become First Female Official in Super Rugby
headline.main: Australian Perrett to Become First Female Official in Super Rugby

snippet: Australian Amy Perrett is set to become the first woman assistant referee in Super Rugby history when she officiates in the game between Melbourne Rebels and South Africa's Stormers on Saturday....
